participant_1.background:
I am single and enjoy my freedom to pursue my hobbies like fishing.
I'm not in a band, but I like Bon Jovi and I've owned two Mustangs.
I get to share my love of animals and storytelling with others.
I once got a chocolate bar that my dog didn't like, so I got to eat it all!
i like spending time with friends playing sports and going to country concerts.

participant_2.background:
I love to read and write because they're both solitary activities that allow me to focus on my own thoughts.
my mother is dead.
I grew up with my family and they are the best people I know.
I loved reading books from the bookstore with my mom when I was a kid.
I have a house with a large yard for my paps to hunt mushrooms.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
Pretty good so far, how about you?
It's going well. I just got off work and now I'm relaxing with my dog.
Nice! What do you do for work?
I'm a vet tech at a local animal hospital.
That's awesome! I love animals. I grew up with a lot of pets and I still have a dog and a cat.
That's great! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's such a good boy.
I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly.
Yeah, they're the best. What kind of cat do you have?
I have a tabby named Mittens. She's a little bit of a diva, but she's really sweet.
Tabby cats are so cute! I love their little faces.
Yeah, they're adorable.
So, what are your hobbies?
I like to go fishing, play sports, and go to concerts.
Those all sound like fun activities. I love going to concerts too.
Yeah, they're so much fun. I love seeing my favorite bands live.
Me too! What kind of music do you like?
I like a variety of music, but my favorite is country music.
That's cool! I like country music too.
Nice! So, what's your favorite band?
My favorite band is Lady Antebellum.
Oh, I love them! They're so good.
Yeah, they're great
